post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Requirements:
Computer science degree
3 to 4 years Java / C++ developer background of which 2 years working with the J2EE standard and EJB
Telecom backgound, 2 years experience
Knowledge in databases - MSSQL 2000 (perhaps some Oracle)

Responsibilities:

The developer will be responsible for adapting and modifying applications for the companies M-Commerce platform.

Developing new applications for Mint's North American Clients.

Implementing complete documentation procedures.

Please forward your resume and cover letter with salary expectations via e-mail

Check out our website www.mintinc.ca


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Temporary/Contract/Project  

Contact Information
fjs@mintinc.ca
Mint Inc.
2902 South Sheridan Way, Second Floor
Oakville ON L6J 7L6
Fax: 416-352-5199
post.title: CA-ON-Burlington-Software Developer
